name: 活力橙
description: 热情活力，适合运动美食

styles.container: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff8f0 0%, #ffedd5 100%); padding: 20px; border-radius: 16px; box-shadow: 0 2px 12px rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.1);

hashtag.container: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px; margin-top: 24px; padding: 16px; background: rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.08); border-radius: 12px; border: 1px solid rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.15);
hashtag.tag: display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; padding: 8px 14px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f97316 0%, #fb923c 100%); color: white; border-radius: 20px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.25);
hashtag.label: font-size: 13px; color: #f97316; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 4px; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px;

code.block: background: #fff8f0; border: 1px solid #ffedd5; border-radius: 12px; padding: 16px; margin: 16px 0; overflow-x: auto; color: #4a4a4a;
code.inline: background: #fff8f0; color: #f97316; padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #ffedd5;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #f97316; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.08) 0%, transparent 100%); padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 0 12px 12px 0; color: #666; font-style: italic;
styles.image: width: 100%; aspect-ratio: 4/3; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 12px; margin: 16px 0; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.15);
styles.link: color: #f97316; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px dashed #f97316; transition: opacity 0.2s;
